verses.text: \w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w ninth|strong="H8671"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* \w day|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*,

“\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*, \w write|strong="H3789"\w* \w down|strong="H3789"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*’s date, \w for|strong="H8034"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w very|strong="H6106"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Babylon \w has|strong="H4428"\w* \w laid|strong="H5564"\w* \w siege|strong="H5564"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H1571"\w* \w speak|strong="H4911"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w parable|strong="H4912"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w rebellious|strong="H4805"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* tell them \w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w Put|strong="H8239"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* \w pot|strong="H5518"\w* \w on|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* fire; \w put|strong="H8239"\w* \w it|strong="H4325"\w* \w on|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w pour|strong="H3332"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

Put \w in|strong="H2896"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w pieces|strong="H5409"\w* \w of|strong="H4390"\w* meat, \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w piece|strong="H5409"\w*—\w thigh|strong="H3409"\w* \w and|strong="H2896"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H3802"\w*—\w fill|strong="H4390"\w* \w it|strong="H2896"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w choice|strong="H4005"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*.

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w choicest|strong="H4005"\w* \w of|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w pile|strong="H1754"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* fuel \w beneath|strong="H8478"\w* \w it|strong="H8432"\w*. \w Bring|strong="H3947"\w* \w it|strong="H8432"\w* \w to|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w boil|strong="H1310"\w* \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w cook|strong="H1310"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w it|strong="H8432"\w*.’

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘Woe \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w bloodshed|strong="H1818"\w*, \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w pot|strong="H5518"\w* \w now|strong="H3541"\w* rusted, \w whose|strong="H5518"\w* \w rust|strong="H2457"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w*! Empty \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w piece|strong="H5409"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w piece|strong="H5409"\w*; \w cast|strong="H5307"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w lots|strong="H1486"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* contents.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w still|strong="H3588"\w* \w within|strong="H8432"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w*; \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w poured|strong="H8210"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w out|strong="H8210"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w bare|strong="H6706"\w* \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*; \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w pour|strong="H8210"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w ground|strong="H6083"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* order \w to|strong="H5927"\w* stir \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w take|strong="H5358"\w* \w vengeance|strong="H5359"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H5414"\w* \w placed|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w bare|strong="H6706"\w* \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*, \w so|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* would \w not|strong="H1115"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w*.’

\w Yes|strong="H1571"\w*, \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘Woe \w to|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w bloodshed|strong="H1818"\w*! \w I|strong="H3541"\w*, \w too|strong="H1571"\w*, \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w pile|strong="H4071"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* kindling high.

Pile \w on|strong="H7235"\w* \w the|strong="H7235"\w* \w logs|strong="H6086"\w* \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w kindle|strong="H1814"\w* \w the|strong="H7235"\w* \w fire|strong="H1814"\w*; \w cook|strong="H8552"\w* \w the|strong="H7235"\w* \w meat|strong="H1320"\w* \w well|strong="H4841"\w* \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w mix|strong="H7543"\w* \w in|strong="H1320"\w* \w the|strong="H7235"\w* \w spices|strong="H7543"\w*; let \w the|strong="H7235"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w be|strong="H6086"\w* \w burned|strong="H2787"\w*.

\w Set|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w empty|strong="H7386"\w* pot \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w coals|strong="H1513"\w* \w until|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* becomes \w hot|strong="H3179"\w* \w and|strong="H5975"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w copper|strong="H5178"\w* \w glows|strong="H2787"\w*. \w Then|strong="H4616"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w impurity|strong="H2932"\w* \w will|strong="H4616"\w* \w melt|strong="H5413"\w* \w within|strong="H8432"\w*; \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w rust|strong="H2457"\w* \w will|strong="H4616"\w* be \w consumed|strong="H8552"\w*.

\w It|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H3318"\w* frustrated \w every|strong="H3318"\w* effort; \w its|strong="H3318"\w* thick \w rust|strong="H2457"\w* \w has|strong="H3318"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w removed|strong="H3318"\w*, \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* fire.

\w Because|strong="H3282"\w* \w of|strong="H2534"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* indecency \w of|strong="H2534"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* tried \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w cleanse|strong="H2891"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* would \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w purified|strong="H2891"\w* \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w filthiness|strong="H2932"\w*. \w You|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w pure|strong="H2891"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w My|strong="H5117"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* \w against|strong="H2534"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w has|strong="H5117"\w* subsided.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w*, \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*; \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w time|strong="H5162"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* coming, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w act|strong="H6213"\w*. \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w refrain|strong="H3808"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w show|strong="H6213"\w* \w pity|strong="H2347"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w relent|strong="H5162"\w*. \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* according \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w deeds|strong="H5949"\w*,’ \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*,

“\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w am|strong="H2005"\w* \w about|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w desire|strong="H4261"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w with|strong="H5869"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fatal \w blow|strong="H4046"\w*. \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w mourn|strong="H5594"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w weep|strong="H1058"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* \w tears|strong="H1832"\w* flow.

Groan quietly; \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w mourn|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*. \w Put|strong="H7760"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w turban|strong="H6287"\w* \w and|strong="H3899"\w* strap \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w sandals|strong="H5275"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*; \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w cover|strong="H5844"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w lips|strong="H8222"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* mourners.”

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w I|strong="H6680"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w my|strong="H6213"\w* \w wife|strong="H1696"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*. \w And|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* next \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w I|strong="H6680"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w I|strong="H6680"\w* \w had|strong="H5971"\w* \w been|strong="H5971"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w*, “Won’t \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w us|strong="H5046"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w these|strong="H6213"\w* \w things|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* mean \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w us|strong="H5046"\w*?”

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w answered|strong="H1697"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w*, “\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*:

Tell \w the|strong="H3069"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H5315"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w am|strong="H2005"\w* \w about|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w desecrate|strong="H2490"\w* \w My|strong="H2490"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*, \w the|strong="H3069"\w* \w pride|strong="H1347"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H5800"\w* \w power|strong="H5797"\w*, \w the|strong="H3069"\w* \w desire|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H5800"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* \w delight|strong="H4261"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H5800"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w you|strong="H5800"\w* \w left|strong="H5800"\w* \w behind|strong="H5800"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.’

\w Then|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*: \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w cover|strong="H5844"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w lips|strong="H8222"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* mourners.

\w Your|strong="H5921"\w* \w turbans|strong="H6287"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w remain|strong="H3808"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w sandals|strong="H5275"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*. \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w mourn|strong="H5594"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w weep|strong="H1058"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w waste|strong="H4743"\w* \w away|strong="H4743"\w* \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w sins|strong="H5771"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w groan|strong="H5098"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H5921"\w*.

‘\w Thus|strong="H1961"\w* \w Ezekiel|strong="H3168"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sign|strong="H4159"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*; \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*. \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H6213"\w* \w happens|strong="H1961"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*.’

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w*, \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*, know \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w stronghold|strong="H4581"\w*, \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w pride|strong="H8597"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w joy|strong="H4885"\w*—\w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w desire|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w which|strong="H1992"\w* uplifted \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*—\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w well|strong="H5869"\w*,

\w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fugitive|strong="H6412"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* come \w and|strong="H3117"\w* tell \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* news.

\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H1931"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w escaped|strong="H6412"\w*; \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* mute. \w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sign|strong="H4159"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.”
